title: Does Tomb Raider Matter Anymore?
description:
Everyone knows Lara Croft, but how many actually care? 

From this episode of KFGD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bxWaqHrLinA&list=PLy3mMHt2i7RIl9pkdvrA98kN-RD4yoRhv&index=1 

Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up your copy of Portillo the Wiener Dog Thinks He’s a Manatee and the new line of Portillo merch!

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
